Where can Marriott Bonvoy points take me?
Redeem points for nights at over 30 hotel brands and 10,000 global destinations including:
The Ritz-Carlton Maldives, Fari Islands
The West Hollywood EDITION, Los Angeles
W Rome
JW Marriott Masai Mara Lodge
The St. Regis Dubai, The Palm
The St. Regis Mumbai
W Dubai - The Palm
Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach
Renaissance Bali Uluwatu Resort & Spa
The Westin Goa
JW Marriott Hotel Cairo
The above is an indication of where you can redeem your earned Marriott Bonvoy Points and these are subject to applicable terms and conditions of the hotels & resorts participating in Marriott Bonvoy and the Marriott Bonvoy loyalty programme.

Marriott Bonvoy Silver Elite  status
Enjoy  complimentary Silver Elite status and benefits, such as:
10%  bonus points on stays
Priority  Late Checkout
Discounted  Member Rates and Free Wi-Fi
Marriott Bonvoy Gold Elite  status
Unlock  next-level benefits when you spend US$40,000 annually on the Card. Benefits  include:
25%  bonus points on stays
Enhanced  Room Upgrade
2 PM  Late Checkout
Elite Night Credits
Each calendar year receive 10 Elite Night Credits towards the next level of Marriott Bonvoy Elite status

Elite Night Credits
Each calendar year receive 10 Elite Night Credits towards the next level of Marriott Bonvoy Elite status

metadata.title: Marriott Bonvoy World Mastercard Credit Card | Emirates NBD

content:
Know more
Elite Night Credits
Each calendar year receive 10 Elite Night Credits towards the next level of Marriott Bonvoy Elite status
Elite Night Credits are the number of Qualifying Nights that you will earn when you stay at hotels participating in Marriott Bonvoy. You will earn one Elite Night Credit* (ENC) for each completed Qualifying Night.
Earning Elite Night Credits (ENCs) help you earn Elite Status.
With the 10 ENCs that you may receive from your Credit Card, you will only need to complete 15 Qualifying Nights to achieve Gold Elite status, instead of 25 Qualifying Nights.
Additional Free Night Award
Receive 1 Free Night Award valued at 35,000 Marriott Bonvoy points on Card anniversary
Know more
Additional Free Night Award
Receive 1 Free Night Award valued at 35,000 Marriott Bonvoy points on Card anniversary

metadata.title: Marriott Bonvoy World Mastercard Credit Card | Emirates NBD

content:
Know more
Additional Free Night Award
Receive 1 Free Night Award valued at 35,000 Marriott Bonvoy points on Card anniversary
Receive an additional Free Night Award every year after your Credit Card account anniversary. Award can be used for one night (redemption level at or under 35,000 Marriott Bonvoy points) at participating hotels. Additionally, the value of your Free Night Award can be combined with up to 15,000 points to help you access even more hotels you'll love. Certain hotels have resort fees.
Complimentary lounge access worldwide with Mastercard Travel Pass.
Enjoy free access to some of the world’s best airport lounges every time you travel.
Know more
Complimentary lounge access worldwide with Mastercard Travel Pass.
Enjoy free access to some of the world’s best airport lounges every time you travel.
Travel in style with the Mastercard Travel App

metadata.title: Marriott Bonvoy World Mastercard Credit Card | Emirates NBD

content:
Minimum salary:
 12,000
Joining fees: 315
Annual fees:  315
Welcome Offer
Receive 1 Free Night Award on cumulative retail spends of US$ 6,000 in the first 3 billing statements from Card issuance.
Each Free Night Award can be redeemed for  a one-night stay at participating Marriott Bonvoy hotels with a redemption  level at or under 35,000 Marriott Bonvoy points. Additionally, the value of  your Free Night Award can be combined with up to 15,000 points to help you  access even more hotels you'll love.
Marriott Bonvoy programme  terms and conditions apply.
Marriott  Bonvoy Points Earning
3 Marriott Bonvoy points per US$1 on  spend at hotels and resorts participating in Marriott Bonvoy.
1
Earn up to 1.5 Marriott Bonvoy  points per US$1 on international spend.
2
Earn up to 1.5 Marriott Bonvoy points per  US$1 on general domestic spend.
3
1.5 points per US$1 on general retail  shopping (e.g.  apparel, dining, etc.)

metadata.title: Marriott Bonvoy World Mastercard Credit Card | Emirates NBD

content:
2
Earn up to 1.5 Marriott Bonvoy points per  US$1 on general domestic spend.
3
1.5 points per US$1 on general retail  shopping (e.g.  apparel, dining, etc.)
0.375 points per US$1 on grocery and  supermarkets, insurance, car dealership related, and quick-service restaurants  (i.e., fast-food restaurants)
4
0.15 points per US$1 on real estate,  education, petroleum, government services, car-hailing services, food delivery  aggregators, and bill payments (including utility and telecommunication)
1. Additional rewards: This is in addition to the points you’ll earn from  the loyalty programme. Please
click here
for full terms
2. International spend is any transaction made internationally in  Foreign/non-AED Currency. Spend made on merchants located in European Union and  United Kingdom earn 50% of the international spend points.

metadata.title: Marriott Bonvoy World Mastercard Credit Card | Emirates NBD

content:
3. In a given statement cycle, points can be  earned for all eligible spend and will be calculated based on category of spend  as defined by Mastercard. The Bank or Marriott International are not  responsible for merchants categorization.
4. Spend made under the category quick service restaurants (i.e.,  fast-food restaurants) will earn 1.5 points per US$1 spent if the value of the  transaction is above US$25.
